name: Bee Sting
description: At Lucy's Fried Chicken in Austin, Texas, local Republic Tequila Reposado is used in this Bee's Knees variation.
recipeIngredient: Garnish: jalapeno slice and lemon twist

recipeInstructions.text: Stir honey and hot water together to make honey syrup.
Muddle jalapeno in the shaker gently. Add tequila, lemon juice, and honey syrup. Fill shaker with ice and shake for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish. Serve straight up.
